Description:
Light-filled and elevated Doncaster corner beauty!
PLEASE REGISTER FOR THE REMOTE DIGITAL AUCTION OF THIS PROPERTY BY CONTACTING THE AGENT
Boasting an elevated corner position which further promises wonderful natural light and generous proportions, this well-presented and utterly charming 4 bedroom family residence is nestled in a quiet Doncaster pocket not far from the action!
Freshly painted and ready to live in right now, this bright treasure has a number of terrific highlights. Stylish timber floors dominate much of the home including the expansive central lounge and dining zone which offers a fantastic north-west orientation and incredible light. Just next door is the sizeable family/meals space which includes the kitchen fitted with a quaint breakfast bar and quality appliances.
All bedrooms come with built-in robe storage including the oversized main bedroom which has direct access to the updated dual entry bathroom delivering separate rooms for the shower, bath, and toilet. A north-facing balcony off the family/meals and kitchen area will be bliss on summer evenings where you can enjoy a wine and look out to the views. There is also excellent garden and courtyard space which adds superb outdoor flexibility.
Other property features include a laundry, ducted heating, split system heating and cooling (incl. in 3 bedrooms), and a double garage. While this property is excellent to live in as is, the corner block on 648 sqm (approx.) also opens up the property to redevelopment (STCA).
Moments to Westfield Doncaster Shopping Centre, Birralee Primary School, Koonung Secondary College, Wilsons Road Reserve, Katrina Street Reserve, Elgar Park, Koonung Creek Trail, and Eastern Freeway with Park & Ride option.

Carving an image of cutting-edge urban design, this no-expense-spared creation by Michael Watkin offers state-of-the-art living in a premier lifestyle pocket.
Generating instant street appeal with its captivating frontage featuring a Cedar timber-cladded double garage and high-impact yet low-maintenance landscaped garden with auto lighting, chic style extends throughout the intelligently zoned two-storey interior, where towering 3m square-set high ceilings downstairs and 2.7m square-set high ceilings upstairs help natural light illuminate the home whilst adding an element of grandeur and architectural sophistication.
A spectacular open-plan living domain with European Oak engineered flooring is awash with northern sunshine and is deserving of its place in the heart of this fashionable home, delighting with its seamless integration with the north-facing entertaining deck yet celebrated for its remarkable sense of height and space. A feature island bench topped with 60mm Carrara marble is the stylish face of the five-star kitchen that excels with its quality Miele appliances and Butlers pantry, while a generous dining area and spacious family living warmed by a feature modern fireplace combine to make this vast living area a comfortable setting to unwind and a glamorous entertainer whenever the occasion presents itself.
The central placement of the carpeted retreat upstairs provides a sizeable buffer between the luxurious master bedroom (with a striking full-length window, fitted walk-in robe and fully-tiled ensuite with a sensored and remote operated smart toilet) and two mirror robed bedrooms, while a second master bedroom downstairs (with fully-tiled ensuite) offers family flexibility.
Escape the tensions of the day with a relaxing soak in the family bathrooms freestanding soaker bath, while a private theatre room with a fixed screen and projector is perfect for those who prefer to get their luxurious fix through a five-star cinematic experience.
Built to an exacting standard with superior finishes and the latest in home technology, this triumph of urban executive living also flaunts a stunning Carrara marble tiled hallway with a feature open-step timber staircase and floor-to-ceiling wine rack, zoned ducted refrigerated cooling/heating and more.
The homes close proximity to Westfield Doncaster Shopping Centre, Macedon Square, parks and elite private and public schools encourages a lock-up and go lifestyle.
